txt.en: 'With luck we managed to be in Ethring before the Orc raiding party arrived. Will luck always be on our side though? We must continue to do our part and secure the Vale.\n\n'[placeholder], let us cross the river Ringló in Ethring and head east towards the Orc camp mentioned by the unfortunate woodcutter. If we perchance upon any Orkish structures, let us destroy them. They shall not defile our Vale any longer!'
Arvaethor has asked you to accompany him to the White Mountain Orc camp and destroy any signs of Orc encroachment upon the Vale.
Orc structures can be found north-east of Ethring.\n\nDestroy Orkish structures in Ringló Vale.
'There was not an Orc presence in this part of the Vale when I patrolled here last. I know not the numbers and strength of the foes we will encounter in this Orc encampment.'
